title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, February 19, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of novelist Carson McCullers (1917), who published “The Heart is a Lonely Hunter” when she was just 23 years old.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of novelist Carson McCullers (1917), who published “The Heart is a Lonely Hunter” when she was just 23 years old.
